img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/75/Wukong_UpperHollow_4.jpg)
Straight ahead from the Shrine, you'll find a Puppet Tick overlooking the cliff past some houses. A sloping path to the left leads down to a broken bridge with a green Wisp to absorb, and a nearby shack has a **Treasure Chest** full of materials guarded by a Puppet Spider and various Stone Spiders.
img_below_text:
Head up the stone stairs back up the slope to find more houses and a green Wisp behind one, with a Lantern Holder out front. Here's a series of stairs leading even higher up from here, leading to a large walled gate.
![Wukong UpperHollow 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9c/Wukong_UpperHollow_6.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 4.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/7/75/Wukong_UpperHollow_4.jpg)
Straight ahead from the Shrine, you'll find a Puppet Tick overlooking the cliff past some houses. A sloping path to the left leads down to a broken bridge with a green Wisp to absorb, and a nearby shack has a **Treasure Chest** full of materials guarded by a Puppet Spider and various Stone Spiders."
        - Following Text: "Head up the stone stairs back up the slope to find more houses and a green Wisp behind one, with a Lantern Holder out front. Here's a series of stairs leading even higher up from here, leading to a large walled gate.
![Wukong UpperHollow 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9c/Wukong_UpperHollow_6.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a dark, rocky area in the game *Black Myth: Wukong*, showing the protagonist cautiously approaching a shack. The shack is illuminated by a glowing figure, and a green Wisp is highlighted nearby (circled in red). This scene aligns with the preceding text, which describes a sloping path leading to a broken bridge and a shack containing a treasure chest guarded by enemies. The image serves to visually guide players to the shack and the green Wisp mentioned in the walkthrough.
